name: POLYGON游戏编辑器
description:
Players can create their own works by dragging the models in the item bar to the world for placement. There are also many mechanism special effects waiting to be explored in the game

Players can set up their own scenes by placing rotating items with the mouse


The editor can be packaged into a game mode and sent to friends to play with the content and results created by oneself


In the game, dialogue NPCs can be placed to engage in content based conversations with players to achieve the game's story content

Use your imagination to create your own gaming world

The editor has fast boundary brushes for plant building and mountain building

Placing items in a grid layout allows players to quickly create their own game content

The time of the game, fog, and color difference on the land Both can be changed

Game packaging mechanism built-in start menu pause menu settings menu

At present, the game contains first person templates, and more content will be released later

The FBX model can be imported. Currently, it is only in the testing phase and does not support saving for viewing and rendering
